subject: [Last Chance to Register] Maximize Workplace Collaboration with Zoom
body:
Discover how to make the most of Zoom's features to improve communications in your company.
 
 
 
 
Webinar
Maximize Workplace Collaboration with Zoom
  
Wednesday, August 16
10:00 a.m. PT | 1:00 p.m. ET
Register now
 
 
Zoom has emerged as the go-to platform for virtual collaboration, providing businesses and teams with the ability to work together seamlessly from any location.
Our Zoom expert will share their insights and tips on how to make the most of Zoom's features to improve communication, increase productivity, and enhance teamwork.
Here's what you can expect to learn from this webinar:
Strategies for using Zoom to foster collaboration among hybrid & remote teams
Best practices for organizing and managing group projects using Zoom
Techniques for using Zoom's chat and file sharing features to streamline communication.
  
Register now
  
Can't make it? 
Register anyway
 and we'll email you the recording!
 
Catch us on social
 
 
 
 
 
Visit 
zoom.us
1-888-799-9666
55 Almaden Blvd., San Jose, CA 95113
© 2023 Zoom - All Rights Reserved
 
You're receiving this email because you signed up for a Zoom account.
You can 
update your preferences
 at any time.
If you wish to be removed from our email list, 
unsubscribe
.

subject: The Post Most: Revealing the Smithsonian’s ‘racial brain collection’
body:
How Donald Trump tried to undo his loss in Georgia in 2020 
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  
 
 
 
Sign up for this newsletter

(Laura Padilla Castellanos/The Washington Post)
 
The Smithsonian amassed a ‘racial brain collection’ for decades 
The Smithsonian’s human brains collection was led by Ales Hrdlicka, a museum curator in the 1900s who believed that White people were superior.

Reap the benefits of the cultural diversity that exists in every organization by utilizing an evidence-based learning journey. 📈 Utilizing our Sustainable Culture of Inclusion ModelTM and the Intercultural Development Inventory®, our intercultural experts help your team thrive in a cross-cultural environment by defining the organization’s unique culture and leveraging differences to create high-achieving teams. Learn more about our Assessment solutions: https://hubs.li/Q01Z929z0 #LCWRebrand #DEI #InclusiveLeadership #Culture

one person liked your LinkedIn post.
 
Reap the benefits of the cultural diversity that exists in every organization by utilizing an evidence-based learning journey. 📈 Utilizing our Sustainable Culture of Inclusion ModelTM and the Intercultural Development Inventory®, our intercultural experts help your team thrive in a cross-cultural environment by defining the organization’s unique culture and leveraging differences to create high-achieving teams. Learn more about our Assessment solutions: https://hubs.li/Q01Z8YC-0 #LCWRebrand #DEI #InclusiveLeadership #Culture 
View
one person liked your LinkedIn post.
 
In our latest podcast, Paul Ladipo explained how the phrase “I don’t see color” can be used as a Get Out of Jail Free card to avoid having brave conversations about race. While the phrase is often viewed as “politically correct,” it allows the individual to remain ignorant of the oppression faced by people of color. “You can say that all you want to. It doesn't change who I am,” he said. “To be ‘colorblind’ is neglecting people and their heritage and their needs.” 💡 ⏯️ Check out the full recording and transcript on our website: https://hubs.ly/Q01-8s_30 #Podcast #DEI #Culture #ThoughtLeadership #Inclusion 
View
one person liked your LinkedIn post.
 
Since 1994, August 9 has marked the International Day of the World’s Indigenous Peoples. We cannot truly stand with Indigenous Peoples without also acknowledging the struggles brought on by centuries of discrimination. According to the United Nations: ➡️ While Indigenous People make up less than 5% of the world’s population, they represent 15% of the poorest. ➡️ Indigenous People are 3x as likely as non-Indigenous people to live in extreme poverty. Today and throughout the year, inclusive leaders must listen to and uplift the incredibly diverse lived experiences of Indigenous People on our journey toward equity, reconciliation, and authentic allyship. #DEI #Inclusion #Culture 
View
one person liked your LinkedIn post.
 
💜 Since 2014, August 7th has been observed as Purple Heart Day in the United States—a day to remember and honor the brave Americans who were either wounded on the battlefield or paid the ultimate sacrifice with their lives. 💜 Today, Veterans make up 6.4% of the United States’ adult population at approximately 16.5 million people, and 30% are living with a disability. 💜 Our Veteran population exemplifies diversity, having sacrificed and served our country regardless of gender, race, ethnicity, religion, economic status, and the many other aspects of identity. 💜 It is crucial that inclusive leaders take the time to understand their lived experiences and continue to support Veterans on our journey toward building truly equitable mindsets and systems. #PurpleHeartDay #DEI #Culture 
View
 
Go to Inbox
 
Under certain privacy laws and regulations, you must tell anyone who interacts with your connected social accounts that their data is being stored in HubSpot. Individuals may also have certain access rights or ask you to delete their information. Since it isn't always possible to know which social media accounts belong to a contact, if a contact requests to remove their data from your account their data may not be fully removed from the social tools. Before using this feature, please review how the applicable laws and regulations impact you.

subject: Training Industry Weekly Recap 📅 August 13, 2023
body:
Review the latest resources from Training Industry.
View this email in your browser
THE BUSINESS OF LEARNING™
Our team is gearing up to end the year strong, bringing you more great content, events and resources to help you spark new ideas and connect with other learning leaders. Here’s a peek at what we have in store:
[Webinar] The Reality of Virtual Reality for L&D: Hosted by Training Industry
[Virtual Conference] Training Industry Conference & Expo (TICE)
[New Course] Harnessing the Power of Competency Modeling
Training Industry’s 2024 Trends Report
We will also be addressing relevant topics on our website, including skills mapping, digital fluency in the workplace, learning technologies and how to make learning stick. If you’re interested in writing, you can 
learn more here
.
I hope you find the resources in this email helpful as you embark on a new week. We love hearing from you, so email us with your thoughts at 
editor@trainingindustry.com
 with any article pitches, suggestions or questions. We hope you have a great week!
Michelle Eggleston Schwartz, CPTM
Editor in Chief 
[Article] L&D Leaders: 4 Ways to Share Your Thought Leadership With Training Industry
Are you a thought leader in the L&D industry with ideas and tips to share with your peers? If so, check out this 
LinkedIn article
 by Training Industry’s senior editor, Sarah Gallo, CPTM, to learn more about ways to share your thought leadership with Training Industry’s global audience of L&D leaders. Because the L&D community is better, together.
Read the Article
 
Identify Your Training Teams' Strengths and Weaknesses
Training Industry research has identified seven core responsibilities and associated competencies that make up our 
Training Manager Competency Model™
. Based on this model, our Training Team Assessment gives you a holistic picture of your teams’ strengths and weaknesses, allowing you to create a targeted plan for their professional development. Use our 
free assessment tool
 to benchmark your training teams' competencies and create a targeted team development plan today.
Learn More
 
[State of the Industry Report] The Sales Training Market
Staying up to date on the latest research and trends is time-consuming but essential. Luckily, we’ve done the research and gathered the insights for you in our new report, “
The State of the Sales Training Market
.” In this report, you’ll find all the information you need to gain a competitive edge and stay ahead in the sales market. With data on trends, modalities, market projections, sourcing practices and more, our newly released report has the answers you need to stay on top of the sales training market.
Get the Report
 
Training Industry’s New Vendor Directory
With thousands of training vendors across the L&D landscape, choosing the right partner can be a daunting task. Save time by starting your search with the 
Training Industry Vendor Directory
. Our comprehensive directory showcases a diverse range of vendors, categorized in 78 specialties, all dedicated to providing innovative products and services to meet your training needs.
Check it Out
 
STRATEGY, ALIGNMENT AND PLANNING 
Reaching the "Digital Natives:" Effective Training Delivery for Gen Z
From bite-sized learning to real-world applications, learn how to train a dynamic, engaged and future-ready Gen Z team.
Read Now →
LEADERSHIP 
The Power of Prioritizing Soft Skills and Emotional Intelligence
The key to emotional intelligence lies in employees observing and acknowledging emotions and acting with empathy.
Read Now →
COMPLIANCE 
How Training Can Help Combat the Mental Health Crisis in the Workplace
In this article, we'll review how training and ongoing learning and development can help combat the mental health crisis in the workplace.
Read Now →
IT AND TECHNICAL TRAINING 
Building the Future of AI, UI and UX
In this article, we'll review best practices to designing UI/UX training for upskilling and reskilling programs for IT technicians.
Read Now →
MEASUREMENT AND ANALYTICS 
5 Time-Tested Tips to Measure Training Effectiveness the Right Way
Is training effective and worth the investment? Let’s take a look at how L&D can measure the impact of training programs.
Read Now →
LEADERSHIP 
Is It Time for a Communication Culture “Cleanup?” Communication Tips for Leaders
Learn how to build a thriving culture of communication in the workplace and advance business outcomes with these best practices for leaders.
Read Now →
PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT 
Navigating the L&D Job Market: How to Stand Out in a Growing Field
Use these tips and best practices to navigate the growing L&D market and stand out in the field.
Read Now →
DIVERSITY, EQUITY AND INCLUSION 
How to Improve — and Assess — DEI Training Impact: An 8-Step Guide
In this eight-step guide, learn how to improve, and assess, the effectiveness of diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) training.
Read Now →
LEARNING TECHNOLOGIES 
Harnessing the Power of AI to Provide Personalized Feedback at Scale
Artificial intelligence (AI) tools can help you deliver personalized feedback to employees at scale: Here's how.
Read Now →
STRATEGY, ALIGNMENT AND PLANNING 
Adapting to Economic Change: How to Prepare Your Learning Team
Discover proactive strategies to navigate uncertain times, connect learning to company objectives and defend your budget effectively.
Read Now →
THE BUSINESS OF LEARNING:
THE TRAINING INDUSTRY PODCAST
Episode 65: The Employee Experience — What’s L&D Got to Do With It? 
Episode 64: One-size-fits-none — The Rise of Personalization and Learning Pathways 
Episode 63: Going Global — Training an International Audience
Episode 62: Women’s Leadership Development — Common Challenges and Actionable Solutions
 
TRAINING INDUSTRY RESEARCH
How Virtual Reality Can Become a Reality for Your Organization
The State of the Sales Training Market
What Learners Want: New Strategies for Training Delivery
Updating 70-20-10 for the 21st Century
 
Explore Research
UPCOMING WEBINARS
CONTENT DEVELOPMENT
August 15, 2023 | 11:00 am ET
The Secret to Doing More With Less: How to Double Your Content Development Output
Sponsored by Xyleme, Inc.
Register Now →
 
 
LEADERSHIP
August 16, 2023 | 1:00 pm ET
[Product Demo] Cloverleaf | Using Assessments to Improve Managerial Effectiveness
Sponsored by Cloverleaf 
Register Now →
 
 
TRAINING INDUSTRY COURSES
 
CPTM PRACTICUMS

subject: The Post Most: Wagner’s prisoner of war: A Ukrainian soldier’s 46-day nightmare
body:

subject: The Post Most: ‘Unluckiest generation’ falters in boomer-dominated market for homes
body:
Hawaii utility faces scrutiny for not cutting power to reduce fire risks 
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

subject: Docebo Partners With Google Cloud, Litmos Enhances Learning Suite and Other L&D News ...
body:
Business News This Week
View this email in your browser
August 12, 2023
Industry News from 
Training Industry
Sign up to receive this newsletter each week
 
 
Docebo Partners With Google Cloud on Generative AI
TORONTO — Aug. 10, 2023
Docebo Inc. (NASDAQ: DCBO; TSX: DCBO), a leading provider of learning platforms with a foundation in artificial intelligence (AI) and innovation, has announced it is partnering with Google Cloud to enhance Docebo’s ability to train enterprise workforces, customers, and related external communities with generative AI technologies.
Read More
 
Litmos Announces Enhancements to its Leading Learning Suite to Meet Growing Needs of Corporate L&D and Training Across the Extended Enterprise
SAN RAMON, Ca. — Aug. 8, 2023
Litmos, a leading global learning solutions provider to the world’s top companies, today unveiled significant investment in its offerings to address the evolving training and development requirements. With innovations across their entire solution suite – including LMS platform, content and services – Litmos customers will gain tailored experiences supported by expert assistance to optimize and enrich their learning initiatives.
Read More
​​​​​​
SALES
RAIN Group Launches Self-Study+ for Sales Teams 
BOSTON — Aug. 9, 2023 
  
RAIN Group, a global sales training company delivering results through in-person and virtual sales training, coaching, and reinforcement, announced today the launch of Self-Study+, an approach combining the advantages of self-paced learning with the power of practice, feedback, and collaboration.
Read More →
LEARNING TECHNOLOGIES
LMS365 Acquires Weekly10 
WREXHAM, UK — Aug. 10, 2023
  
LMS365, an AI-powered learning platform integrated with Microsoft 365 has announced the acquisition of Weekly10, a dynamic performance and engagement management company based in Wrexham, UK.
Read More →
PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT
Open LMS Expands Into Professional Certification Market 
RALEIGH, N.C. — Aug. 10, 2023
  
Open LMS, a leading global provider of open-source learning management systems (LMSs), today announced its expansion to enhance professional certification programs.
Read More →
LEARNING TECHNOLOGIES
Uplimit (Formerly CoRise) Opens Their AI Education Platform to Enterprises 
SAN FRANCISCO — Aug. 8, 2023
  
Uplimit (formerly CoRise), the AI-powered online learning platform, is excited to announce that it is building on its success achieving industry-leading learning outcomes at scale––both for individual learners and enterprise clients including high-growth start-ups through the Fortune 500––and will open its platform to a select group of beta enterprise clients to run their own courses.
Read More →
COMPLIANCE
ThriveDX Launches Cybersecurity Apprenticeship Program to Reskill Cybersecurity Talent and Enhance Workplace Diversity 
MIAMI — Aug. 10, 2023
  
ThriveDX, the global leader in cybersecurity and digital skills training, continues its mission to reskill and upskill the global cybersecurity workforce with the launch of a Cybersecurity Apprenticeship Program that will create job opportunities for diverse cyber talent at no-training cost.
Read More →
ONBOARDING
VirgilHR Introduces Chat-Based Employee Classification Tool for 50-State Compliance 
GAITHERSBURG, Md. — Aug. 8, 2023
  
VirgilHR, the technology company removing risk from HR compliance, announced the release of a chat-based tool for employee onboarding that allows organizations to properly classify employees as exempt or non-exempt during onboarding.
Read More →
L&D's Most Trusted Content on The Business of Learning
Research
 | 
Top 20
 | 
Training Landscapes
 | 
Marketing Services
Training Industry
“We make connections”ᵀᴹ. Training Industry has a passion for making connections. We cultivate high-value conversations for select solution providers, as well as with our highly engaged community of corporate learning and development leaders and decision makers. These conversations benefit the entire training industry by surfacing challenges, sharing innovations and communicating rapidly evolving best practices.
Connect With Us
Facebook
 | 
Twitter

Training Industry, Inc.

subject: The latest from Harvard Business Review.
body:
HBR’s recent books on managing your career, office politics, leadership, managing people, and more. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 
BOOKS
COLLECTIONS
TOOLS
CASE STUDIES
STORE
 
New from HBR
 
Retirement is perhaps the greatest and most personal career transition you’ll ever make. Will you switch gears, slow down, or stop working entirely? The 
HBR Guide to Designing Your Retirement
 provides the practical tips, research, stories, and advice you need to take stock of your skills and interests and define retirement for yourself.
LEARN MORE
 
 
Every organization has its share of political drama, but you need to work productively with your colleagues for the good of your organization and your career.
LEARN MORE
 
Achieve your goals by managing up, down, and across your organization.
LEARN MORE
 
Are you a good boss, or a great one?
LEARN MORE
It is possible for companies to provide jobs that offer a living wage, dignity, and opportunities for growth.
LEARN MORE
 
A research-based, practical guide for how to handle difficult people at work.
LEARN MORE
 
HBR's antidote to the Logan Roy School of Toxic Leadership.
LEARN MORE
Discover more at the HBR Store
Find additional books, tools, and more.
SHOP NOW
 
To redeem, simply enter 
HBRORGREG4
 in the Promotional Code field at checkout. Discount will be applied to your order subtotal of your first purchase only. 
*Valid online or by phone (excludes HBR magazine subscriptions, shipping & handling, taxes, and customs fees). Cannot be combined with other offers or discounts, including bulk pricing. No adjustments to prior purchases.
Purchasers are responsible for all shipping charges, duties, taxes, brokerage fees, and/or import fees imposed by the country of import.

subject: Best person to discuss web partnership at LCW?
body:
Hi again Jacob,
I’ve reached out a few times and wanted to be sure to connect -- 
Who would be the best contact for me at LCW?
In case you missed my first couple of emails: Convertiv is focused on leveraging web and marketing technology to accelerate growth for clients. Here’s what one of our customers had to say:
“
A lot of consultancies talk about partnership, but Convertiv’s collaborative approach closely aligns all aspects of our digital initiatives from strategy to execution. Convertiv is truly an extension of our team
.”
         -James Donovan, Global Head of MarTech, SimilarWeb
Are you the best person to review Convertiv at LCW? If so, let me know and I can help you get started. Feel free to connect me with a colleague of yours if not.
Thank you!
–
Jack Bernard
3 Post Office Square,
5th Floor
Boston, MA 02109
This email is a solicitation and is intended for residents of the United States. If you are not a resident of the United States, or would like to unsubscribe, please respond "Unsubscribe."
